results.name: Smallest k > 0 such that n*k + 1 is an n-th power.
link: Marius A. Burtea, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..150
mathematica: Do[k = 2; While[ !IntegerQ[(k^n - 1)/n], k++ ]; Print[(k^n - 1)/n], {n, 1, 20}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Oct 21 2002 *)
program: if IsIntegral((k^u-1)/u) then sol[u]:=(k^u-1)/u; break; end if;
